Name: Chronicle of Innsmouth
About the game: Based on 'The Shadow over Innsmouth' by master of horror H.P. Lovecraft , and inspired by the classic gameplay of the early 90s' Lucasarts adventures , Chronicle of Innsmouth sets you on a path to discover the secrets of the cursed town of Innsmouth. The second chapter of this franchise, Mountains of Madness , will be available on Steam very soon – you can already Wishlist and follow it here . The story begins with a trip through New England. At the Newburyport station, you hear for the first time about the fishing town of Innsmouth – once a rich and thriving port, now a decadent forsaken place, surrounded by rumors about disappearances, hidden cults and all kinds of unspeakable horrors. . Moved by sheer curiosity, you decided to investigate the truth behind these odd stories. But Innsmouth and its inhabitants guard its secrets carefully – and the truth might be a burden too heavy for anyone's sanity. Investigate, gather information and solve enigmas and puzzles to get to the bottom of all the mysteries of Innsmouth – if you dare, for you may find answers you would have preferred not to hear.
